column4: hi everybody.  I have an ipod and gtkpod.  This worked before but now gtkpod doesn't see my ipod anymore.  And the ipod icon is not showing up on the desktop either.  but my ipod says "do not disconnect" so it sees some connection.  any ideas?
I think it's maybe second gen?  it's 20G and it's white with silver back.  it worked before tho
